text: phir jab hamaare qaasidh Looth(alaihissalaam) ke paas pahonche to wo un ki wajeh se ghamgeen hoye aur dil hee dil mein ranj karne lage, qaasido ne kaha aap na khauf khaiye aur na aazurda ho, hum aap ko ma3 aap ke mutalleqeen ke bacha lenge, magar aap ki biwi, ke wo azaab ke liye baaqi reh jaane waalo mein se hogi
